author: Vexed (Vexed#3211)
description: Get the time in different timezones in voice channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing! You can get started with the `tcset` command, and anything added under can be seen by users in the server with `[p]timezones`

This cog has docs! Check them out at <https://s.vexcodes.com/c/timechannel>
name: TimeChannel
short: Get the time in different timezones in voice channels.
